程序包 P3

接口 Action

所有已知实现类:
chessAction, goAction
public interface Action

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.lang.String actionType()
    ask the action's type
    boolean askSuccess()  
    boolean capture()
    capture a piece by another piece(chess) or a group of pieces(go)
    boolean move()
    move one piece to a chose position
    static Action newAction​(java.lang.String gameType, Player player, java.lang.String actionType, Piece piece, Position... positions)
    generate a new Action of one piece do the action
    Player player()  
    boolean put()  

  • 方法详细资料

    • newAction

      static Action newAction​(java.lang.String gameType, Player player, java.lang.String actionType, Piece piece, Position... positions)
      generate a new Action of one piece do the action
      参数:
      gameType - String of the type of the game
      player - the acting player
      actionType - String of the type of the action
      piece - the operating piece
      positions - the positions related to the action
      返回:
      an object of a type of Action(chessAction or goAction)

    • put

      boolean put()
      参数:
      piece - the putting piece
      返回:
      true if the putting is legal

    • move

      boolean move()
      move one piece to a chose position
      返回:
      true if the move is legal

    • capture

      boolean capture()
      capture a piece by another piece(chess) or a group of pieces(go)
      返回:
      true if the capture is legal

    • actionType

      java.lang.String actionType()
      ask the action's type
      返回:
      the action's type

    • player

      Player player()
      返回:
      who does the action

    • askSuccess

      boolean askSuccess()
      返回:
      true if the action is done successfully
